name: Legends of Iskaria: Days of Thieves
description: Legends of Iskaria is a 2D RPG which claims to be non-linear and immersive. The game is mainly focus on story-telling, dialogs and exploration. Built with love for 16bits graphics, it takes up some components of classic RPGs while playing with genre codes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 98, XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Pentium III 800 MHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Storage: 241 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit) Processor: Intel PentiumÂ® 4 2.0 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Storage: 241 MB available space
